levels.description: Summons a 'Blazing Sun' on a deployable ground tile within the four adjacent tiles, dealing <@ba.vup>{value:0%}</> ATK as True damage to nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{value2}</> seconds. Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</> and damage type changes to <@ba.vup>True damage</> when attacking enemies blocked by self or the 'Blazing Sun'
